titleStmt.title: The course of the tare of cloth in Holland
titleStmt.author: Company of Merchant Adventurers of England.

notesStmt.note: "To the right honourable the Lords of His Maiesties most honourable Privie Counsell. The humble petition of the fellowship of the Merchants Adventurers of England" at end.
Place and date of publication from STC.
Requesting aid in obtaining relief from the Dutch abatements in payment for allegedly faulty cloth. --STC.
Identified as STC 5875a on UMI microfilm reel 1268.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
